content: The eighth Symposium on Compositional Structures will be happening in Tallinn, 13-14Â December 2021! https://www.cl.cam.ac.uk/events/syco/8/ :)

We're kicking off SYCO 8 in two days! The programme and current list of participants is here: https://www.cl.cam.ac.uk/events/syco/8/

You are still in time to register to participate online.
It's a pity I wasn't able to come, it's been at least two years I wanted to visit TallCats... I registered online though
